title: book_Foghorn_Outdoors_Pacific_Northwest_Hiking
text:
ISBN-13: 9781566915908.
ISBN-10: 1566915902.
Title: Foghorn Outdoors Pacific Northwest Hiking.
Subtitle: The Complete Guide to More Than 1,000 of the Best Hikes in Washington and Oregon.
Authors: Scott Leonard;Megan McMorris.
Categories: Sports & Recreation.
Thumbnail: http://books.google.com/books/content?id=C7V1GwAACAAJ&printsec=frontcover&img=1&zoom=1&source=gbs_api.
Description: This complete guide explores more than 1,000 of the best hikes in Washington and Oregon, with details on treks through Mount Rainier National Park, the Columbia River Gorge, the Olympic Peninsula, and a wealth of hikes within easy reach of Seattle and Portland. Trail maps, photos, & illustrations..
Published Year: 2005.
Average Rating: 4.29.
Number of Pages: 912.
Ratings Count: 12.
